text_block_list.text:
Some time after I became Sakura Chiyono 
O's trainer, on a day off-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer-san! 
Good afternoon.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! In preparation for the Derby, 
I need to train my body up a bit more!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Maruzen-san is… the person I look up to is, entrusting their 
dreams to me. That's why I definitely… have to fulfill it…!
choice_data_list: I'll do my best to support you!
I'll do my best to support you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Well then, I'm going for another run, okay? "Peach and chestnuts 
3 years, persimmons 8, Japan Derby and a very strong faith"!

Even now, I still don't understand the true 
meaning of her proverbs, but Sakura Chiyono 
O definitely had a strong conviction.

For the sake of her dreams, I need to become her support- 
No, I want to become her support. I started feeling like that.

After that, after finishing my errand, 
I once again passed by the riverside when-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Face each other~… Ready your spirit!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Still in! You're still in!

text_block_list.name: Sumo-loving horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Sumo-loving horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Eh?! Uwaaa?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
An underarm throw, beautifully executed~. 
Wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Sumo-loving horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Waaaaaah! You were staggering 
so I thought it was my chance!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, there are times when that's a feint. If the opponent is 
coming low, you should be vigilant about your legs!

text_block_list.name: Sumo-loving horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
I see… 
Thanks, Chiyo-chan!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Eh?! 
Trainer-san?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
My dad's a Rikishi. That's why, 
since I was little I've seen alot of matches.
choice_data_list: Did you want to try Sumo?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: No no, I'm satisfied just by watching…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
But, those two… they're from the neighborhood association's 
Sumo club, and they're serious about engaging in Sumo-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
A Sumo advisor? 
You mean me?

text_block_list.name: Sumo-loving horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Just once is fine! We want to get even stronger…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Even… stronger…

text_block_list.name: Sumo-loving horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
I lost agaaaain~. 
It seems like being short is really a bad thing, huh…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
That's not true! With a small body, you can make smaller 
and more precise movements. If I remember correctly, 
with the tactics my dad taught me-

text_block_list.name: Sumo-loving horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Chiyo-chan! 
I won a practice match! It's my first victory…!

text_block_list.name: Sumo-loving horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Really, thank you!! 
It's all thanks to Chiyo-chan!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
It's because both of you worked so hard…! 
Really, congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
At first, it was just going to be that one time though. 
But, seeing those two, it made me want to support them more.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Straight-forward and hard-working… seeing that brings me 
courage. It makes me think I need to work hard in races too.
choice_data_list: Watching you makes me think the same
Watching you makes me think the same

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Eh? I do…?
choice_data_list: Seeing you work hard, always brings me courage

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
N-no, no way, that's praising me too much! 
I'm just, doing what I need to do…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I'm just average, so I need to make up for it with quantity, 
or something like that-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
But! If that's what gives Trainer-san strength then… 
I'll work even harder!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Maruzen-san and my dream… 
and then, from now on for Trainer-san too!

Seeing Sakura Chiyono O enthusiastic about a new goal, 
once again encouraged me.
